Name: Flames of Fury
Story Background: In the heart of the volcano, ancient fire elementals unleash their wrath upon intruders.
Ability: Flames of Fury deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Appearance Description: The card art depicts a swirling vortex of flames consuming a hapless adventurer, their silhouette visible in the inferno.
